info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 7:15PM EDT until July 29 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Rutherford County in western North Carolina... Northeastern Polk County in western North Carolina... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 715 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northwest of Rutherfordton, or 7 miles east of Lake Lure, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Forest City, Rutherfordton, Spindale, Ellenboro, Bostic, Green Hill, Thermal City, Harris, Union Mills and Shingle Hollow. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
